name: json-formatter
title: JSON Formatter & Validator
description: Pretty-print and validate JSON files with proper indentation and sorting
content:
Overview

This application validates and formats JSON files with proper indentation, sorted keys, and UTF-8 encoding. It checks for JSON syntax errors and outputs a clean, readable version of your JSON data.

Features

  • Validates JSON syntax and reports errors
  • Pretty-prints with 2-space indentation
  • Sorts object keys alphabetically
  • Preserves Unicode characters

Parameters

  • Input JSON File: Upload your JSON file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the formatted output

Output

The application generates a file named {original_name}_formatted.json with properly formatted JSON content.

Use Cases

  • Cleaning up minified JSON files
  • Validating JSON configuration files
  • Making JSON data human-readable
  • Standardizing JSON formatting across projects
command: rm -rf prod_apps && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python prod_apps/python/json_formatter.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
